text:
dAqtmAna#mEqva ya#j~jayaSaqsEnA$rpayatiq yadi# kAqmayE#taq yaja#mAnaM ~Myaj~ja yaSaqsEnA$rpayEyaq-mitya#ntaqrA sa#dOhavid^^rdhAqnE tiShThaqnnava# nayEqd-yaja#mAnamEqva ya#j~jayaSaqsEnA$-rpayatiq yadi# kAqmayE#ta sadaqsyAn# 
yaj~ja yaSaqsEnA$-rpayEyaqmitiq sada# AqlaByAva# nayEth sadaqsyA#nEqva ya#j~jayaSaqsEnA$rpayati || 5
(itI$ - ndriqyamEqva - puna#H puna - rnayEqt - traya#stri(gm)Sacca) (A1)
